title: Flood Risk Assessment and Management Strategies for Commercial Real Estate

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of real estate market structures and risk assessment concepts
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening practical skills through case studies and expert interviews for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze flood risk information in commercial real estate and explain interpretation methods based on reliability.
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of insurance incentives for mitigating flood risks across diverse insurance and risk management systems.
Learners can design flood risk assessment models that consider commercial real estate characteristics (e.g., limited transaction data, remote investors).
Learners can apply flood risk management strategies to practical settings based on international case studies and expert interviews.

resources: Commercial Real Estate Transaction Data Sample

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
